description: Search Etsy listings, fetch shop details, and explore trending products. Create and update listings, manage inventory, images, and shop sections when authorized. Streamline product research and shop operations directly from your workspace.

apiKey.description: Your Etsy API key (Keystring) from the Etsy Developer Portal. Falls back to ETSY_API_KEY environment variable.

shopId.description: Your Etsy shop ID (optional, for faster shop operations). Falls back to ETSY_SHOP_ID environment variable.

accessToken.description: OAuth access token for shop management features (optional, required for write operations). Falls back to ETSY_ACCESS_TOKEN environment variable.

capabilities.name: search_listings
capabilities.description: Search for active Etsy listings. Supports keyword search with various filters.

capabilities.name: get_listing
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific Etsy listing by its ID.

capabilities.name: get_shop
capabilities.description: Get information about an Etsy shop by shop ID.

capabilities.name: get_shop_listings
capabilities.description: Get all active listings from a specific shop.

capabilities.name: search_shops
capabilities.description: Search for Etsy shops by shop name.

capabilities.name: get_listing_inventory
capabilities.description: Get inventory information for a listing, including available quantities and variations.

capabilities.name: get_listing_images
capabilities.description: Get all images associated with a specific listing.

capabilities.name: get_shop_sections
capabilities.description: Get all sections/categories for a specific shop.

capabilities.name: get_trending_listings
capabilities.description: Get current trending listings on Etsy.

capabilities.name: find_shops
capabilities.description: Find shops by location or other criteria.

capabilities.name: create_listing
capabilities.description: Create a new listing in your Etsy shop. Requires OAuth access token.

capabilities.name: update_listing
capabilities.description: Update an existing listing. Requires OAuth access token.

capabilities.name: delete_listing
capabilities.description: Delete a listing from your shop. Requires OAuth access token.

capabilities.name: update_listing_inventory
capabilities.description: Update inventory for a listing (quantities, prices, SKUs). Requires OAuth access token.

capabilities.name: upload_listing_image
capabilities.description: Upload an image to a listing. Requires OAuth access token and image file.

capabilities.name: create_shop_section
capabilities.description: Create a new shop section/category. Requires OAuth access token.

capabilities.name: update_shop_section
capabilities.description: Update a shop section. Requires OAuth access token.

capabilities.name: delete_shop_section
capabilities.description: Delete a shop section. Requires OAuth access token.

capabilities.name: update_shop
capabilities.description: Update shop information (title, announcement, etc.). Requires OAuth access token.
